pullRequest.title: Fix for Constructor injection when using OpenApi annotations in JAX-Rs resource

nodes.bodyText: We usually use plain strings for the class names in the build items.
This needs proper Javadoc. Not entirely sure about the name.
Why not adding the whole org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations package?

commit.message:
Provide support of OpenApi annotations with resteasy extension

- Support for JaxRs friendly annotations from other extension with a new build item
- Refactor existing friendly package prefix with the new build item
- Add test case for OpenApi annotations
